body_html: @teng-li FYI on this issue. You recently added python bindings test_allgather_ops #10159, Also when I run ./torch/lib/build/c10d/test/ProcessGroupNCCLTest , the test hangs when executing in function testAllgather. An additonal data point, when using CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES=0,1 or CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES=2,3 the test passes. But when using CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES=0,3 or CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES=1,2 the test fails with illegal memory access.

An additonal  data point,  when using CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES=0,1  or  CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES=2,3  the test passes.   But when using CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES=0,3 or CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES=1,2 the test fails with illegal memory access.
body: @teng-li  FYI  on this issue.  You recently added python bindings test_allgather_ops #10159,    Also when I run ./torch/lib/build/c10d/test/ProcessGroupNCCLTest  ,  the test hangs when executing in function testAllgather.   An additonal  data point,  when using CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES=0,1  or  CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES=2,3  the test passes.   But when using CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES=0,3 or CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES=1,2 the test fails with illegal memory access.
